column1: TOL is a Primitive Quendian Sundocarme signifying "stick out or up" or "stick up

column2: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/elfling/message/32555 "Telerin in VT47 and elsewhere" (message 32555; dated 18 October 2005) at Elfling (mailing list)/?QuenyaHelge Fauskanger

column1: In the The Etymologies appears the root TOL2
In the Qenya Lexicon appears the root TOLO
column2: yielding a variety of derivatives (among them Qenya tolome "island" and tolda "hill with a flat top
